title: 82x10: Government Printing Office and 18 U.S.C. § 207
summary: 18 U.S.C. § 207 restrictions apply only to employees of entities within the executive branch as those terms are defined by 18 U.S.C. § 6 and 5 C.F.R. § 737.3(a)(2).  The Government Printing Office does not fall within those definitions and has long been recognized as part of the legislative branch.
